modName: Bless You - Ice Form Word Replacer
summary: Replaces the words of the Ice Form shout to something more humorous.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]2vqWn7-Xh0U[/youtube]

I've always thought the background sfx of the Ice Form shout sounded like the user was sneezing. Besides, having a cold may be considered to have a connection to this shout. So I did this simple but funny mod, hope you all enjoy! Doesn't affect Draugr or unique NPC's.

For an extra funny effect, try using this in conjuction with the Animated Shout Farting mod :P

Credits goes to Sounddogs.com for the audio I used.
author: T3alrose
